description: Change https://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/a4223f1d89ea7033cbae35790a0411ec439cdb6d missed nova-manage.  Need to change local_gb to root_gb in most cases.
title: nova-manage update for local_gb -> ephemeral_gb

comments.content: Change https://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/a4223f1d89ea7033cbae35790a0411ec439cdb6d missed nova-manage.  Need to change local_gb to root_gb in most cases.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~dtroyer

comments.content:
flavor create needs to accept --root_gb and --ephemeral_gb, flavor list needs to display both.

service describe_resource needs attention too...
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~dtroyer

commit 4cdcf1dbffe20ce406e8d4b93a972480e9cb02a0
Author: Dean Troyer <email address hidden>
Date:   Tue Jan 24 20:04:56 2012 -0600

    Fixes bug 921265 - i'nova-manage flavor create|list'
    
    These problems were introduced in https://review.openstack.org/2918
    * nova-manage needs the change from local_gb to root_gb/ephemeral_gb.
    * fixes 'nova-manage flavor ...'
    * fixes 'nova-manage service describe_resource ...'
    
    Change-Id: I63040359a425aac3ef7a0a84e6834b1dfe3a8790
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
